kpi.name: LTE_98a

kpi_info.title: TOT IP PHB_class_3 to send DV lost due CG
kpi_info.use: Total data volume within the Expedited Forwarding PHB_class_3 that was dropped in the IP scheduler due to congestion. The counter is available for both the Ethernet-based IP interface and for each VLAN interface of the BTS

kpi.kpi_alias: TOT IP PHB_class_3 to send DV lost due CG
